Name: Reconciliation Candidates
Description: This type holds information about 2 objects that are candidates for reconciliation. It holds also information about the properties based on which the decision has been taken.

Properties.Name: Reconciliation Candidate
Properties.Description: An object marked as reconciliation candidate

Properties.Name: Reconciliation Properties
Properties.Description: Properties based on which the candidates were selected for reconciliation

Properties.Name: Reconciliation Dismissed
Properties.Description: Has the reconciliation objects been marked as dismissed

Properties.Name: Reconciliation Merge
Properties.Description: The marked objects are ready for merging
